articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Ignatova has been on the run since 2017 and charged with operating a massive Ponzi scheme that stole billions from investors.
articles.title: OneCoin's 'Cryptoqueen' Lands on FBI's Most Wanted List

articles.description: The discount disparity has since recovered slightly, but only due to Bitcoin's falling price.
articles.title: Grayscale Bitcoin Trust Trades 35% Lower Than BTC Price After ETF Denial

articles.description: Traders can now access in-depth data on Solana’s rising NFT projects, which had previously only been available for users on Ethereum.
articles.title: What’s Hot on Solana? Nansen Adds Analytics Data for 53,000 NFT Collections

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: The veteran music streaming company has released a litepaper outlining the launch of its planned $NAPSTER token.
articles.title: Music Streaming Company Napster To Launch Its Own Token On Algorand

articles.description: Ethereum has rolled out a new scheduled major network upgrade called “Gray Glacier,” pushing the difficulty bomb back another 100 days.
articles.title: ‘Gray Glacier’ Upgrade Goes Live on Ethereum Network

articles.description: Three Arrows Capital has been reprimanded by Singapore's monetary authority for providing the regulator with misleading information.
articles.title: Singapore Regulator Reprimands Three Arrows Capital for 'Providing False Information'

articles.description: Bitcoin, the largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization, plummeted to a low of below $19,000 earlier today.
articles.title: Bitcoin Slips Below $19,000 as Ethereum Drops 9% and Nears $1,000

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Leading NFT marketplace OpenSea has warned customers of possible phishing attacks after reporting a data breach through its email vendor.
articles.title: NFT Platform OpenSea Joins Long List of Crypto Data Breach Victims

articles.description: The SEC blocked Grayscale's latest application, saying it did not do enough to prevent possible fraud.
articles.title: Grayscale Is Suing SEC After Spot Bitcoin ETF Rejection

articles.description: It's been a cruel summer for crypto markets, with BTC fluttering around its peak price in 2017.
articles.title: Bitcoin Dips Below $20,000 Once Again

articles.description: The annual JPEG party circuit was bullish business as usual for many, and more like Burning Man for some.
articles.title: Vibe Check: What Was NFT NYC Like Amid a Bear Market?

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Analysis suggests the hack is the work of the Lazarus Group, the Pyongyang-backed group behind a similar $622 million hack of Axie Infinity.
articles.title: North Korean Attackers Behind $100M Harmony Hack: Report

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The new rules will require service providers, such as crypto exchanges, to store identifying information for wallets making transactions of any size.
articles.title: EU Finalizes Crypto Anti-Money Laundering Rules, Walks Back Tracking of Private Wallets

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: There’s less money in NFTs, but the pace of sales hasn't changed much.
articles.title: Ethereum NFT Trading Volume Falls By 70% in June—But Number of Sales Steady

articles.description: The company looked at on-chain flows of stETH, Ethererum staked with the platform Lido to accrue daily rewards.
articles.title: Nansen Analysis Examines How Terra Collapse Affected Celsius and Three Arrows Capital

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Dynamics Mining took to social media on Sunday with claims that Compass Mining owed hundreds of thousands of dollars.
articles.title: Bitcoin Miner Compass Denies Allegations of Unpaid Power Bills to Dynamics

articles.description: Alex Adelman, CEO of Bitcoin shopping rewards app Lolli, talked to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward at NFT NYC about why NFTs have impressed him and why he's "kind of sad" because Bitcoin "should have captured" the cultural moment that Ethereum and NFTs did.
articles.title: Lolli Bitcoin Shopping App CEO at NFT NYC: NFTs 'Captured the Zeitgeist'

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Coinbase users can now earn passive yield as high as 3.85% by holding their SOL in the Solana network through their Coinbase accounts.
articles.title: Coinbase Adds Solana Staking Rewards—With Higher Return Than Ethereum

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The CEO of Lolli told Decrypt he's "sad" because Bitcoin “should have captured” the cultural moment that Ethereum NFTs did—but there’s still time.
articles.title: Bitcoin ‘Optimist’ Alex Adelman Calls NFTs ‘Perfect Intersection of Culture and Technology’

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: MicroStrategy has so far lost money on its Bitcoin bet, but that isn’t stopping the company from buying more of the cryptocurrency.
articles.title: MicroStrategy Puts Another $10M in Bitcoin—Despite Price Crashing Below $20K

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: The Lido community is currently voting against a proposal that would limit how much Ethereum can be staked on the platform.
articles.title: Lido Community Signals Intent to Keep Ethereum Staking Uncapped

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: North Korea’s ill-gotten crypto gains have plunged in value—which could impact on its nuclear weapons program, according to a new report.
articles.title: North Korea's $400M Crypto Losses Could Hurt Its Nuclear Weapons Program: Report

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: A court in the British Virgin Islands has ordered Singapore-based crypto fund Three Arrows Capital to be liquidated, according to recent reports.
articles.title: Crypto Fund Three Arrows Capital Ordered to Liquidate: Report

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Bram Cohen’s storage-based crypto network Chia just launched NFTs on its mainnet. Can a robust market sprout from the new standard?
articles.title: Chia Aims to Take on Ethereum, Solana With NFTs. Will They Blossom?

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Amid yet another crypto market correction, the price of Bitcoin fell to a weekly low under $20,000 on Wednesday morning.
articles.title: Bitcoin Dips Below $20,000 as Crypto Market Pressure Intensifies

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The Bitcoin mining firm elevates two executives to interim co-CEOs in bid to achieve the "next level of growth."
articles.title: Compass Mining CEO and CFO Resign, Company Cites 'Setbacks and Disappointments'

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: He also said record labels soon will realize their IP is “better served on the blockchain than sitting in the catalog collecting cobwebs.”
articles.title: Snoop Dogg: Crypto Bear Market ‘Weeded Out’ Those ‘Abusing the Opportunities’

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: While Nexo fights to clear its name, some of the lender's largest wallets, including what Nansen says is its on-chain corporate treasury, show a $838 million balance.
articles.title: Nexo Says It’s Nothing Like Celsius and Other Crypto Lenders. Here's What the Data Shows

articles.description: Just ahead of a live event during NFT NYC from BeetsDAO and Decrypt, Margaret Link and Keatly Haldeman of Dequency talk to Decrypt EIC Dan Roberts about how their company is using the Algorand blockchain to de-bug the decades-old process of music synchronization rights.
articles.title: NFT NYC: How Dequency Is Using Blockchain to Decentralize Music Usage Rights

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: CoinFLEX CEO Mark Lamb took to Twitter today to accuse longtime Bitcoin evangelist Roger Ver of defaulting on a $47 million loan.
articles.title: CoinFLEX Says 'Bitcoin Jesus' Roger Ver Is Behind Its Withdrawal Troubles, $47M Debt

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The crypto storage firm will allow institutions to stake the second-largest digital asset by market cap.
articles.title: Anchorage Digital Announces Ethereum Staking For Institutions

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The Ronin bridge is back online more than three months after attackers completed one of the largest DeFi heists to date.
articles.title: Axie Infinity’s Ethereum Bridge Back Online After $622M Hack

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: The HTC Desire 22 Pro comes preloaded with "Viverse" apps to navigate the metaverse and manage your crypto and NFTs.
articles.title: HTC's New Metaverse Phone Includes Crypto and NFT Wallet

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Kaiko has raised fresh funds to strengthen its position in the crypto data market, tripling its valuation.
articles.title: Crypto Data Firm Kaiko Raises $53M, Defying Bear Market

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The crypto exchange is cutting DOGE, SHIB, and 13 other coins from Earn, but adding ZIL, NEAR, and FTM.
articles.title: Crypto.com Removes Dogecoin, Shiba Inu, Others From Earn Program

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The thieves have sent $36 million of the $100 million in stolen Ethereum to a mixing service.
articles.title: Harmony Hackers Begin Laundering Ethereum Stolen From Horizon Bridge

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Some crypto companies are feeling the crunch of a market crash and reducing their employee headcount to cope—but others are still expanding and securing fresh talent. Here's who's hiring and firing in crypto right now.
articles.title: Who’s Firing—And Still Hiring—During the Bitcoin Bear Market

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The head of the Commission says he will only comment on Bitcoin, despite public statements by former SEC officials.
articles.title: SEC Chair Gensler Again Says Bitcoin Is Not a Security. What About Ethereum?

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: FTX denied the Bloomberg report, saying there are "no active M&A conversations about Robinhood currently taking place."
articles.title: FTX Eyeing Purchase of Robinhood: Report

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: America’s biggest crypto exchange is laying off 18% of its workforce. A Goldman analyst said that’s not enough.
articles.title: Goldman Sachs Downgrades Coinbase Shares, Predicts 60% Revenue Decline

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: The ProShares Short Bitcoin Strategy ETF also saw $15.3 million in inflows amid the ongoing crypto bear market.
articles.title: Bitcoin Funds Saw $453M in Outflows Last Week: CoinShares

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: 3AC has yet to repay its debt to Voyager Digital. Now, the latter has issued a default notice as part of its attempts to recover the loan.
articles.title: Voyager Digital Issues Three Arrows Capital With Default Notice

articles.description: A first look at actor Bill Murray's upcoming Ethereum NFT project with The Chive and Project Venkman.
articles.title: The Bill Murray 1,000 NFT Project Reveal Trailer

articles.description: Stepn is the talk of Crypto Twitter: an app that rewards you in crypto for exercising outdoors. But first you have to buy a pricey sneaker NFT. Stepn CMO Shiti Manghani joined the gm podcast to talk about how the app works, its GST and GMT tokens, Stepn's recent decision regarding China, and why the future for NFTs is utility.
articles.title: gm: Meet 'Move to Earn' NFT App Stepn

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin talks to Superchief Gallery co-founder Edward Ed Zipco about NFTs and the potential for digital art at Superchief's 10 anniversary showing in Los Angeles.
articles.title: NFTs and Knife-Throwing Abound at Superchief Gallery in LA

articles.description: From Dolce & Gabbana to Balmain, big names in fashion are embracing crypto and NFTs. Decrypt's Stephen Graves, Dan Roberts, Sander Lutz and contributor Alys Keys discuss the trend.
articles.title: #DecryptLive: Luxury Fashion Brands Are Going Crypto

articles.description: Arcade, an NFT liquidity provider, says it's facilitating $25 million in loans against blue-chip NFTs like Bored Apes. Arcade CEO Gabe Frank talks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson at Consensus 2022.
articles.title: Collateralized Monkey JPEGs: CEO of Arcade Talks to Decrypt at Consensus

articles.description: A dapp is a decentralized app built on blockchains to give you more ownership and freedom in your digital life. Dapps are the next generation of software. Explore the vast selection of dapps on Ethereum today. Curious how to build dapps? Start building free at infura.io.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What is a Dapp?

articles.description: Neal Stephenson, who coined the term "metaverse" in his seminal novel "Snow Crash," speaks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson along with Bitcoin Foundation founder Peter Vessenes, about the new "free metaverse" they're co-launching, Lamina1.
articles.title: Bringing 'Snow Crash' to Life: Neal Stephenson Talks to Decrypt at Consensus

articles.description: Paul Puey, CEO of Edge Wallet, spoke to Decrypt's Jason Nelson about Edge's announcement of a new "confidential" crypto Mastercard. After Edge announced the card on Wednesday, Mastercard blasted crypto media to say it has nothing to do with the product—despite Puey telling Decrypt, "MasterCard is involved in entire process. They fully approved this, it’s fully legal and approved by MasterCard. It fits entirely within their framework.”
articles.title: Edge CEO Paul Puey Talks 'Confidential' Bitcoin Mastercard Launch

articles.description: Christine Brown left her perch as Robinhood Crypto COO at the end of March to launch a new crypto venture. Now she has announced her new gig: Co-founder and COO at Floor, a token-gated NFT portfolio app that has raised an $8 million seed round. She talked to Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the company's plans, her own crypto and NFT bags, and her outlook on NFTs and on Robinhood.
articles.title: gm: Christine Brown Left Robinhood to Go Full NFT

articles.description: Spencer Dinwiddie's creator token platform Calaxy has raised another $26 million in funding. Dinwiddie tells Decrypt's Stacy Elliott what makes Calaxy stand out and why it can succeed.
articles.title: NBA's Spencer Dinwiddie Talks $26M Raise for Social Crypto App Calaxy

articles.description: Rebecca Lamis, who co-founded UnicornDAO with Nadya Tolokonnikova of the band Pussy Riot, sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson in Justin Aversano's new Quantum Art physical NFT space to discuss diversity and inclusion in Web3.
articles.title: How To Change the 'NFTs Are Bad' Narrative: UnicornDAO Co-Founder Rebecca Lamis

articles.description: Quantum's Justin Aversano sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at the new Quantum Spaces in Santa Monica, CA. Justin discusses the gallery, his new project Doppelganger, and what's next for real-world NFT exhibitions.
articles.title: Twin Flames Creator Justin Aversano Opens Physical NFT Space in LA

articles.description: Shiti Manghani of STEPN, Ty Blackard of NFTY Labs, William Quigley of Wax blockchain, and Spencer Yang of Gomu talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts about how the next era of NFTs will have utility and real-world use cases, as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.
articles.title: NFTs with Utility: STEPN, NFTY Labs, Wax, and Gomu Predict What's Next

articles.description: Dan Held, a longtime Bitcoin influencer and now head of growth marketing at crypto exchange Kraken, talks to Decrypt's Dan Roberts about Bitcoin maximalists (he calls himself a "mostamalist"), NFTs, and Crypto Winter as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.
articles.title: Kraken's Dan Held Talks Bitcoin Maximalism and Crypto Winter
